doc:
Shirley Jean Rickert https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shirley_Jean_Rickert 0 Shirley Jean Rickert (March 25, 1926 – February 6, 2009) was an American child actress who was briefly the "blonde girl" for the Our Gang series in 1931, during the Hal Roach talkie period. Shirley_Jean_Rickert ( March_25_,_1926 – February_6_,_2009 ) was an_American_child_actress who was briefly the_"_blonde_girl " for the_Our_Gang_series in 1931 , during the_Hal_Roach_talkie_period .
